name: NEON (itch) (Voivy)
description:
This is the first game that I made in Godot engine. I'm fairly happy with it. It's got very simple gameplay, but I think it's fun. It would be better suited for mobile and I'll may port it. I'll see. I'm happy that now I understand the Godot engine better. I also for the first time made some options for the player. You can adjust the difficulty smoothly, so everyone should find the right spot.

The goal of the game is obviously to dodge the flying... things. You can post your score in the comments (I'm just curious).

_____________________________________________________________________________________

CONTROLS:

Work both WASD and Arrowkeys. Controller should also work, but I wouldn't count on it.

Titlescreen:

Up & Down - Adjusting the background color's darkness

Left & Right - Adjusting the difficulty (cyan = easy; magenta = hard)

End key (I thought it's least likely to be pressed by accident) - Reseting the highscore

Space - Start the game

Esc - Quit the game

Playfield:

Arrow keys - move

Esc - Return to titlescreen

____________________________________________________________________________________

I would be grateful for any tips or constructive critique. I think I know about most of the flaws, but maybe you'll surprise me.  : ) 

P.S. I'm not a native english speaker so sorry for the mistakes.
